node.html:
• Working as a Senior Software Engineer building applications using .Net, Angular and Java.
  • Working with the Switzerland team to build and extend their platform focused on Insurance solving problems using AI IPEX
  • IPEX handles insurance claims and automate the process to support insurance officers by increasing their throughput.
  • Developing features on both the front end using angular and backend using .net.
  • Noticeable contributions after joining the team are.
    • Improving website's loading by optimizing endpoints as much as 48%.
    • Improving developer's ticket throughput by 30% using standard practices.
    • Helping DevOps team solve problems regarding deployment, pipeline and websocket.
    • Spearheaded and standardized test writing.
    • Written over 300+ unit tests for frontend and backend.
    • Contributed to internal microservices and platform products.
    • Built microservices using Java and Quarkus.

• Developed and shipped highly scalable microservice based web application using dotnet.
  • Worked as a team lead in one of the top e-commerce platform Transcom Digital Ltd
  • Developed and shipped another e-commerce platform for a non profit in hawaii thepantry.org
  • Developed and shipped a social networking site for school students in hawaii Global Aloha

• Developed and shipped highly interactive mobile application using flutter
  • Built internal shopify sales dashboard using laravel.

• UTA in OOP course using Java, Database course using Oracle and Data Structure course using C++.
  • Helping and conducing practical labs.
  • Helping students with course works, understanding OOP, DB and DSA course works.
